name: Hidden Speech
text: You greatly enhance the ability of the subjects to communicate hidden messages to each other. Each target gains a +10 competence bonus on Bluff checks to send secret message to other recipients. Others using opposed Sense Motive checks to decipher these messages receive a –5 penalty. All subjects affected by the spell must share a language to be able to pass messages.
component_text: V, S, M/DF (a cipher written on a piece of parchment)

effects.text: you plus one creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
